selectedVerses.text: And he said to the people, "Go forward. March around the city and let the armed men pass on before the ark of the LORD."
You shall march around the city, all the men of war going around the city once. Thus shall you do for six days.
So Miriam was shut outside the camp seven days, and the people did not set out on the march till Miriam was brought in again.
This was the order of march of the people of Israel by their companies, when they set out.
All those listed of the camp of Judah, by their companies, were 186,400. They shall set out first on the march.
